list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a quotation from or reference to a book, paper, or author, especially in a scholarly work.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there were dozens of citations from the works of Byron
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có hàng tá trích dẫn từ các tác phẩm của Byron

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mention of a praiseworthy act or achievement in an official report, especially that of a member of the armed forces in wartime.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the citation described him as an officer of extreme gallantry
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trích dẫn mô tả anh ta là một sĩ quan của Extreme Gallentry
